title: Evocable items
data:
***Version [0.31](/0.31 "0.31")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

**Evocable items** are magical items, with abilities that are [evoked](/Evoke "Evoke") using the **V** key. Evocables generally use the [Evocations](/Evocations "Evocations") skill to determine strength.

Many evocable items are comparable to spells, with some sharing a similar effect. Unlike spells, evocables do not have a failure rate (though some may check [willpower](/Willpower "Willpower") to cause an effect), can be cast during [Silence](/Silence "Silence"), usually have no MP cost, and are allowed by [Trog](/Trog "Trog"). However, most evocables are limited by charges. You'll need to gain XP, or find more of the same item, in order to use them again. So instead of being a primary means of attack, Evocations tends to be used sparingly, in order to solve sketchy situations.

## Contents

- [1 Staves](#Staves)
  - [1.1 Artefacts](#Artefacts)

- [2 Wands](#Wands)

- [3 Miscellaneous Evokers](#Miscellaneous_Evokers)

  - [3.1 Elemental](#Elemental)
  - [3.2 Summoning](#Summoning)
  - [3.3 Other Evocables](#Other_Evocables)

- [4 Other Items](#Other_Items)

- [5 History](#History)

  - [5.1 Added Evocables](#Added_Evocables)
  - [5.2 Removed Evocables](#Removed_Evocables)
  - [5.3 Removed Evocations Scaling](#Removed_Evocations_Scaling)

## Staves

Magical staves deal extra elemental damage in melee, scaling with skill in both their respective magic school and [Evocations](/Evocations "Evocations"). Staves are not proper evokers, so are the exception to a few rules. They are *magical*, and forbidden by Trog. Staves do not have charges. Artefacts may have directly evoked abilities, but they must be wielded and use MP or some other cost in order to cast.

- [![Magic staff 1.png](/images/0/09/Magic_staff_1.png)](/File:Magic_staff_1.png) [List of magical staves](/Magical_staff "Magical staff")
- [![Elemental staff.png](/images/e/e3/Elemental_staff.png)](/File:Elemental_staff.png) The [Elemental Staff](/Elemental_Staff "Elemental Staff") is boosted by Evocations skill, similar to, but distinct from, other magical staves.

### Artefacts

Two [unrandart](/Unrandart "Unrandart") items provide an ability, which scales with [Evocations](/Evocations "Evocations") skill and can be activated from the [abilities](/A "A") menu:

- [![Staff of olgreb.png](/images/f/fc/Staff_of_olgreb.png)](/File:Staff_of_olgreb.png) [Staff of Olgreb](/Staff_of_Olgreb "Staff of Olgreb"): Casts [Olgreb's Toxic Radiance](/Olgreb%27s_Toxic_Radiance "Olgreb's Toxic Radiance") and also acts as a somewhat more powerful [staff of alchemy](/Staff_of_poison "Staff of poison").
- [![Orb of Dispater.png](/images/e/e7/Orb_of_Dispater.png)](/File:Orb_of_Dispater.png) [Orb of Dispater](/Orb_of_Dispater "Orb of Dispater"): Hurls [damnation](/Damnation "Damnation"), but costs 10% HP.

## Wands

*Main article: [Wands](/Wands "Wands")*

A wand is a magical device that contains several charges of a specific spell. It does not need to be wielded to be used.

- [![Wand wood.png](/images/7/75/Wand_wood.png)](/File:Wand_wood.png) [List of Wands](/Wands#List_of_wands "Wands")

## Miscellaneous Evokers

These items can be used to evoke effects. Each miscellaneous evocable can appear once per game, except for figurines of a ziggurat. They cannot be eaten by [Jiyva](/Jiyva "Jiyva") slimes.

### Elemental

The higher the user's [Evocations](/Evocations "Evocations") skill, the more powerful the effect will be. Once used, all items of that type will become inert until you have gained enough experience.

- [![Phial of floods.png](/images/4/47/Phial_of_floods.png)](/File:Phial_of_floods.png) [Phial of floods](/Phial_of_floods "Phial of floods"): Launches a damaging wave of water, creating a pool of shallow water and waterlogging creatures caught in the wave.
- [![Lightning rod.png](/images/f/f9/Lightning_rod.png)](/File:Lightning_rod.png) [Lightning rod](/Lightning_rod "Lightning rod"): Fires a bolt of electricity; evoking it in successive turns strengthens the bolt and lets you sweep it over an area

Only one of these two items will appear in a given game:

- [![Tin of tremorstones.png](/images/8/82/Tin_of_tremorstones.png)](/File:Tin_of_tremorstones.png) [Tin of tremorstones](/Tin_of_tremorstones "Tin of tremorstones"): Creates multiple explosions of shrapnel near the player; always risks hitting yourself, but damage is greatly reduced by armour.
- [![Condenser vane.png](/images/e/ec/Condenser_vane.png)](/File:Condenser_vane.png) [Condenser vane](/Condenser_vane "Condenser vane"): Creates harmful [clouds](/Cloud "Cloud") around every enemy in sight.

### Summoning

These items can be used to summon a creature or two, possibly along with other effects. In most cases, their power depends upon your Evocations skill. Like elemental evokers, they are rendered inert until you gain more experience.

- [![Phantom mirror.png](/images/7/71/Phantom_mirror.png)](/File:Phantom_mirror.png) [Phantom mirror](/Phantom_mirror "Phantom mirror"): Creates a short-lived copy of a single monster
- [![Horn of geryon.png](/images/b/b9/Horn_of_geryon.png)](/File:Horn_of_geryon.png) [Horn of Geryon](/Horn_of_Geryon "Horn of Geryon"): Summons a few [hell beasts](/Hell_beast "Hell beast"), some of which may be hostile.

Only one of these two items will appear in a given game:

- [![Box of beasts.png](/images/2/23/Box_of_beasts.png)](/File:Box_of_beasts.png) [Box of beasts](/Box_of_beasts "Box of beasts"): Summons a randomly-generated [mutant beast](/Mutant_beast "Mutant beast")
- [![Sack of spiders.png](/images/b/bf/Sack_of_spiders.png)](/File:Sack_of_spiders.png) [Sack of spiders](/Sack_of_spiders "Sack of spiders"): Summons multiple spiders, and has a chance to [web](/Web "Web") nearby monsters.

### Other Evocables

- [![Figurine of a ziggurat.png](/images/1/15/Figurine_of_a_ziggurat.png)](/File:Figurine_of_a_ziggurat.png) [Figurine of a ziggurat](/Figurine_of_a_ziggurat "Figurine of a ziggurat"): Creates an entrance to a [ziggurat](/Ziggurat "Ziggurat").

## Other Items

- [Artefacts](/Artefact "Artefact") may come with evocable [Blink](/Blink "Blink").
- [![Scarf2a.png](/images/4/41/Scarf2a.png)](/File:Scarf2a.png) [Scarves](/Scarves "Scarves") and [artefacts](/Artefact "Artefact") of [invisibility](/Invisibility_\(ego\) "Invisibility (ego)") can be evoked to turn you [invisible](/Invisible "Invisible").

## History

- Prior to [0.30](/0.30 "0.30"), miscellaneous evocables were not unique: you could find multiple in 1 game, and they could be eaten by [Jiyva](/Jiyva "Jiyva") slimes. Also, the [condenser vane](/Condenser_vane "Condenser vane") and [tin of tremorstones](/Tin_of_tremorstones "Tin of tremorstones") were not [mutually exclusive](/Item_set "Item set") with each other.

### Added Evocables

- [0.31](/0.31 "0.31") - [Sack of spiders](/Sack_of_spiders "Sack of spiders")
- [0.27](/0.27 "0.27") - [Piece from Xom's chessboard](/Piece_from_Xom%27s_chessboard "Piece from Xom's chessboard")
- [0.26](/0.26 "0.26") - [Condenser vane](/Condenser_vane "Condenser vane")
- [0.25](/0.25 "0.25") - [Tin of tremorstones](/Tin_of_tremorstones "Tin of tremorstones")
- [0.16](/0.16 "0.16") - [Phantom mirror](/Phantom_mirror "Phantom mirror")
- [0.13](/0.13 "0.13") - [Phial of floods](/Phial_of_floods "Phial of floods")
- [0.11](/0.11 "0.11") - [Lightning rod](/Lightning_rod "Lightning rod")

### Removed Evocables

- [0.31](/0.31 "0.31") - [Piece from Xom's chessboard](/Piece_from_Xom%27s_chessboard "Piece from Xom's chessboard")
- [0.25](/0.25 "0.25") - [Crystal ball of energy](/Crystal_ball_of_energy "Crystal ball of energy"), [fan of gales](/Fan_of_gales "Fan of gales"), [lamp of fire](/Lamp_of_fire "Lamp of fire"), [sack of spiders](/Sack_of_spiders "Sack of spiders")
- [0.20](/0.20 "0.20") - [Disc of storms](/Disc_of_storms "Disc of storms"), [rods](/Rod "Rod")
- [0.19](/0.19 "0.19") - [Stone of tremors](/Stone_of_tremors "Stone of tremors")
- [0.18](/0.18 "0.18") - [Lantern of shadows](/Lantern_of_shadows "Lantern of shadows")
- [0.16](/0.16 "0.16") - [Tome of destruction](/Tome_of_destruction "Tome of destruction")
- [0.14](/0.14 "0.14") - [Bottled efreets](/Bottled_efreet "Bottled efreet")
- [0.10](/0.10 "0.10") - [Crystal ball of seeing](/Crystal_ball_of_seeing "Crystal ball of seeing")
- [0.8](/0.8 "0.8") - [Crystal ball of fixation](/Crystal_ball_of_fixation "Crystal ball of fixation")

### Removed Evocations Scaling

These items remained in the game, but lost their Evocations component.

- [0.30](/0.30 "0.30") - [Sceptre of Asmodeus](/Sceptre_of_Asmodeus "Sceptre of Asmodeus"), [orb of energy](/Energy "Energy")
- [0.19](/0.19 "0.19") - [Decks](/Deck "Deck")

| Miscellaneous [Evocables](/Evocable "Evocable")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [Figurine of a ziggurat](/Figurine_of_a_ziggurat "Figurine of a ziggurat") • [Horn of Geryon](/Horn_of_Geryon "Horn of Geryon") • [Lightning rod](/Lightning_rod "Lightning rod") • [Phantom mirror](/Phantom_mirror "Phantom mirror") [Phial of floods](/Phial_of_floods "Phial of floods") / [Gell's gravitambourine](/Gell%27s_gravitambourine "Gell's gravitambourine") • [Condenser vane](/Condenser_vane "Condenser vane") / [Tin of tremorstones](/Tin_of_tremorstones "Tin of tremorstones") • [Box of beasts](/Box_of_beasts "Box of beasts") / [Sack of spiders](/Sack_of_spiders "Sack of spiders") |
html:
Evocable items

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.31: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.

Evocable items are magical items, with abilities that are evoked using the V key. Evocables generally use the Evocations skill to determine strength.

Many evocable items are comparable to spells, with some sharing a similar effect. Unlike spells, evocables do not have a failure rate (though some may check willpower to cause an effect), can be cast during Silence, usually have no MP cost, and are allowed by Trog. However, most evocables are limited by charges. You'll need to gain XP, or find more of the same item, in order to use them again. So instead of being a primary means of attack, Evocations tends to be used sparingly, in order to solve sketchy situations.

Contents

  • 1 Staves
    • 1.1 Artefacts
  • 2 Wands
  • 3 Miscellaneous Evokers
    • 3.1 Elemental
    • 3.2 Summoning
    • 3.3 Other Evocables
  • 4 Other Items
  • 5 History
    • 5.1 Added Evocables
    • 5.2 Removed Evocables
    • 5.3 Removed Evocations Scaling

Staves

Magical staves deal extra elemental damage in melee, scaling with skill in both their respective magic school and Evocations. Staves are not proper evokers, so are the exception to a few rules. They are magical, and forbidden by Trog. Staves do not have charges. Artefacts may have directly evoked abilities, but they must be wielded and use MP or some other cost in order to cast.

  • List of magical staves
  • The Elemental Staff is boosted by Evocations skill, similar to, but distinct from, other magical staves.

Artefacts

Two unrandart items provide an ability, which scales with Evocations skill and can be activated from the abilities menu:

  • Staff of Olgreb: Casts Olgreb's Toxic Radiance and also acts as a somewhat more powerful staff of alchemy.
  • Orb of Dispater: Hurls damnation, but costs 10% HP.

Wands

Main article: Wands

A wand is a magical device that contains several charges of a specific spell. It does not need to be wielded to be used.

  • List of Wands

Miscellaneous Evokers

These items can be used to evoke effects. Each miscellaneous evocable can appear once per game, except for figurines of a ziggurat. They cannot be eaten by Jiyva slimes.

Elemental

The higher the user's Evocations skill, the more powerful the effect will be. Once used, all items of that type will become inert until you have gained enough experience.

  • Phial of floods: Launches a damaging wave of water, creating a pool of shallow water and waterlogging creatures caught in the wave.
  • Lightning rod: Fires a bolt of electricity; evoking it in successive turns strengthens the bolt and lets you sweep it over an area

Only one of these two items will appear in a given game:

  • Tin of tremorstones: Creates multiple explosions of shrapnel near the player; always risks hitting yourself, but damage is greatly reduced by armour.
  • Condenser vane: Creates harmful clouds around every enemy in sight.

Summoning

These items can be used to summon a creature or two, possibly along with other effects. In most cases, their power depends upon your Evocations skill. Like elemental evokers, they are rendered inert until you gain more experience.

  • Phantom mirror: Creates a short-lived copy of a single monster
  • Horn of Geryon: Summons a few hell beasts, some of which may be hostile.

Only one of these two items will appear in a given game:

  • Box of beasts: Summons a randomly-generated mutant beast
  • Sack of spiders: Summons multiple spiders, and has a chance to web nearby monsters.

Other Evocables

  • Figurine of a ziggurat: Creates an entrance to a ziggurat.

Other Items

  • Artefacts may come with evocable Blink.
  • Scarves and artefacts of invisibility can be evoked to turn you invisible.

History

  • Prior to 0.30, miscellaneous evocables were not unique: you could find multiple in 1 game, and they could be eaten by Jiyva slimes. Also, the condenser vane and tin of tremorstones were not mutually exclusive with each other.

Added Evocables

  • 0.31 - Sack of spiders
  • 0.27 - Piece from Xom's chessboard
  • 0.26 - Condenser vane
  • 0.25 - Tin of tremorstones
  • 0.16 - Phantom mirror
  • 0.13 - Phial of floods
  • 0.11 - Lightning rod

Removed Evocables

  • 0.31 - Piece from Xom's chessboard
  • 0.25 - Crystal ball of energy, fan of gales, lamp of fire, sack of spiders
  • 0.20 - Disc of storms, rods
  • 0.19 - Stone of tremors
  • 0.18 - Lantern of shadows
  • 0.16 - Tome of destruction
  • 0.14 - Bottled efreets
  • 0.10 - Crystal ball of seeing
  • 0.8 - Crystal ball of fixation

Removed Evocations Scaling

These items remained in the game, but lost their Evocations component.

  • 0.30 - Sceptre of Asmodeus, orb of energy
  • 0.19 - Decks
Miscellaneous Evocables
Figurine of a ziggurat • Horn of Geryon • Lightning rod • Phantom mirror
Phial of floods / Gell's gravitambourine • Condenser vane / Tin of tremorstones • Box of beasts / Sack of spiders

{{version031}} '''Evocable items''' are magical items, with abilities that are [[evoke]]d using the '''V''' key. Evocables generally use the [[Evocations]] skill to determine strength. Many evocable items are comparable to spells, with some sharing a similar effect. Unlike spells, evocables do not have a failure rate (though some may check [[willpower]] to cause an effect), can be cast during [[Silence]], usually have no MP cost, and are allowed by [[Trog]]. However, most evocables are limited by charges. You'll need to gain XP, or find more of the same item, in order to use them again. So instead of being a primary means of attack, Evocations tends to be used sparingly, in order to solve sketchy situations. ==Staves== Magical staves deal extra elemental damage in melee, scaling with skill in both their respective magic school and [[Evocations]]. Staves are not proper evokers, so are the exception to a few rules. They are ''magical'', and forbidden by Trog. Staves do not have charges. These items can be used to summon a creature or two, possibly along with other effects. In most cases, their power depends upon your Evocations skill. Like elemental evokers, they are rendered inert until you gain more experience. *[[File:Phantom mirror.png]] [[Phantom mirror]]: Creates a short-lived copy of a single monster *[[File:Horn of geryon.png]] [[Horn of Geryon]]: Summons a few [[hell beast]]s, some of which may be hostile. Also, the [[condenser vane]] and [[tin of tremorstones]] were not [[item set|mutually exclusive]] with each other. ===Added Evocables=== *[[0.31]] - [[Sack of spiders]] *[[0.27]] - [[Piece from Xom's chessboard]] *[[0.26]] - [[Condenser vane]] *[[0.25]] - [[Tin of tremorstones]] *[[0.16]] - [[Phantom mirror]] *[[0.13]] - [[Phial of floods]] *[[0.11]] - [[Lightning rod]] ===Removed Evocables=== *[[0.31]] - [[Piece from Xom's chessboard]] *[[0.25]] - [[Crystal ball of energy]], [[fan of gales]], [[lamp of fire]], [[sack of spiders]] *[[0.20]] - [[Disc of storms]], [[rod]]s *[[0.19]] - [[Stone of tremors]] *[[0.18]] - [[Lantern of shadows]] *[[0.16]] - [[Tome of destruction]] *[[0.14]] - [[Bottled efreet]]s *[[0.10]] - [[Crystal ball of seeing]] *[[0.8]] - [[Crystal ball of fixation]] ===Removed Evocations Scaling=== These items remained in the game, but lost their Evocations component. *[[0.30]] - [[Sceptre of Asmodeus]], [[energy|orb of energy]] *[[0.19]] - [[Deck]]s {{Evocables}} [[Category:Items]]
